content: {"name": "Remnant Church of God", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/RCOG7thDay/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7708 Ogontz Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "North Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19150", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.071019, "longitude": -75.1578397}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 924-2610", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:45"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:45", "closes_at": "13:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Program runs 6/21/22 to 8/26/22"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}]}
